data.text: We stayed one night there and, wow, we were treated like Kings. The receptionist was kind enough to upgrade us to the King Burj Suite, that actually became a huge playground for our children! They loved running around the main bedroom. All the staff were so kind and helpful, we felt so welcome. We have been to several 5-star hotels and this hotel could easily be in this category. The facilities, the service, and, above all, the experience correspond to a 5-star hotel and not simply to a 4-star one.
data.title: More than expected!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you very much for taking the time to complete our guest reviews following your stay.

Thank you indeed for sharing your wonderful experience and for recommending us on TripAdvisor with perfect rating. It is our goal to achieve the highest standards of rooms quality and services we could offer to our guests, and it is always rewarding for our team to learn that we have met your satisfactions. 

I will personally convey your appreciation to the entire team, we are grateful for your inspiring words. 

Thank you once again and we look forward to welcoming you back at Doubletree by Hilton - Business Bay.

Regards,

Princess Grace Suaring
Duty Manager
Doubletree by Hilton - Business Bay
owner_response.author: Abdellah Fattah

data.text: 5 stars service enjoyed my stay and dinner at Square special mention to the Egyptian waiter Naieem who was very friendly and attentive, the atmosphere is very spectacular and the vibes are very cozyyy , the whole team is very nice starting from the front office and the concierge till the team in the restaurant.
data.title: Cozy place

data.text:
The whole experience in the hotel was amazing. the bedroom was spacious, very clean and the bed was very comfortable. the bathroom had a shower and a bath tub as well and spacious. 
The staff were super friendly and very helpful when needed. they even went to the extra step to even ensure that our needs were met and beyond. 
My family and I were very happy with our stay and we did not feel uncomfortable at any moment. 
The Hotel location is also very good, it has some shops next to eat were you can eat or have coffee ort snacks. 
there is even a laundry place next door which came in very handy. 
the swimmin pool area was very nice and we had our drinks there in teh late evening and Shisha and was very pleasant. 
I recommned the Hotel to anyone, and i am sure they will not be disappointed.
data.title: Superb Stay at the Double Tree Hilton.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Our Valued Guest,

I am very pleased to read your positive review from your recent stay with us at DoubleTree by Hilton Dubai – Business Bay. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and recommend our hotel on TripAdvisor.

With pleasure I read that you have been overall impressed with the quality of our hotel and service. Your gracious comments will serve as an added inspiration to consistently maintain the high standards which you have experienced during your stay with us.

We look forward to welcoming you back and to continue exceeding your expectations.

Best regards,

Hany Ahmed
General Manager
DoubleTree by Hilton Dubai – Business Bay
owner_response.author: Hanna Palermo

data.text:
We made reservations for Malaysian night on Saturday a couple of weeks before in advance which was something my wife and I had never done before. 
Undoubtedly a striking design, spacious buffet, pleasant atmosphere. 

However, there weren't many vegetarian options available to us as an Indian, and the food at the buffet was tasteless and crept dessert..(Do not assume that since I am Indian, I am ignorant of dishes. As an FYI, I worked in the hotel industry and particularly  in the F&B department.) 

Let's move on. We told a staff member about the situation and asked if they could manage to get one vegetarian dish. When he inquired about our preferences, we mentioned vegetarian biryani. He quickly rejected and offered vegetarian fried rice, which we agreed to.

The fried rice lacked flavor and was undercooked. We left the rice bowl as it was served and made our way home. The employee inquired about the experience. We informed him that we only relished dessert. He presented the black tea and karak from the buffet. We requested again as to if he could only manage a single latte, please. Yet he nodded his head with “NO”

Therefore, I'm calling our experience "fake" because, as a member of the hospitality industry, I know what you could have done but chose not to. And rating here 2 stars for the ambience and dessert.
data.title: Phony hospitality that was unexpected

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor.

I would like to apologize for the inconvenience you have, and please rest assured all your concerns will be addressed accordingly. 

Warm regards,
Hany Ahmed
General Manager
owner_response.author: Hanna Palermo

data.text:
We had an amazing stay here! 

We stayed with our 4-year-old daughter, and she really loved it. To start with, she is really a fan of Doubletree hotels, but this property is exceptional and is now at the top of her list. Their team was very welcoming and accommodating, most especially Hannah. She's very nice and friendly; she welcomed us with her biggest smile, made us feel like very important guests, and made our stay extra special. We have stayed with several Hilton Hotels before, and she is by far the nicest staff we have met.

The hotel was very clean, their room was very spacious, room service and housekeeping were very responsive, and the location couldn’t be better. There are restaurants and groceries outside the hotel, and the ambience is just really calm and relaxing. 

We just love everything about this hotel, and we will definitely come back and stay longer.
data.title: Four-star hotel with five-star services
